REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0436 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-SHO 04-01 0052

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET SHORTAGE FORECAST REVISED UP
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it had revised its estimate of the shortage in the money market up to 1.3 billion stg from 1.2 billion before taking account of its early operations. The Bank has provided 689 mln stg assistance so far today. REUTER
